Array: * I am not your enemy,^05 but an\n  average mole.
* I would like to add a bit\n  of flavor to your experience.
* Or would a bit of advice be\n  more useful to you...?
* I'm willing to help either way!
* Did you notice the blue\n  bullets in the last fight?
* Those weren't just for show.^05\n* You can actually do something\n  special to avoid them!
* If your SOUL isn't moving,^05 then\n  they'll phase through you!
* Though I hear if they hit you\n  on a moving platform,^05 it'll\n  hurt even if you stand still.
* So be careful to not be\n  moving AT ALL.
